name: KillControl
subtitle: An awesome Orion tweak!
description:
One swipe to kill all apps + more.

Features:
- Swipe down to kill all apps.
- Kill apps after locking the device.
- Grace period in which apps wont get killed.
- Kill specified apps when another chosen app is opened.
- Open specified apps when another chosen app is opened.
- Blacklist apps from being closed.
- An option to not kill now playing apps.
- Optional confirmation prompt.
author: Ginsu
